Privacy Policy

Introduction

Welcome to BudgetMaker ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and providing you with a secure experience while using our mobile application ("App"). This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information when you use our App. By accessing or using the App, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.

Types of Data We Collect

Personal Data

While using our App, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

  • Email address
  • First name and last name
  • Account Avatar
  • Any other data you voluntarily provide

Usage Data

We may collect data about how you interact with the App through cookies, analytics, and similar means. This data includes:

  • Pages visited
  • Features used
  • Account Avatar
  • Other actions you take within the App

Device Data

We may collect data about your device, including its:

  • Unique device identifier
  • Operating system
  • Browser type
  • Mobile network information

Use of Data

We use the collected data for the following purposes:

  • To provide and improve the App's functionality, features, and user experience.
  • To communicate with you, including responding to your inquiries and providing customer support.
  • To send you updates, notifications, and marketing materials (you can opt out of marketing communications).
  • To monitor and analyze usage patterns to enhance the App's performance and usability.
  • To detect, prevent, and address technical issues and unauthorized access.

Data Sharing and Disclosure

We may share your information under the following circumstances:

  • With Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating and maintaining the App.
  • For Legal Purposes: We may share your information to comply with legal obligations, protect our rights, and respond to legal requests.
  • With Your Consent: We may share your information with third parties when you give us your explicit consent to do so.

Security

We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

Your Choices

You can control the collection and use of certain information through your device settings and by choosing not to provide certain information. You may also opt out of receiving marketing communications from us.

Children's Privacy

The App is not intended for individuals under the age of 12. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under this age. If you believe we have collected information from a child under 12 years of age, please contact us immediately by sending an email to support@budgetmaker.app

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated policy within the App. Your continued use of the App after the changes indicates your acceptance of the revised Privacy Policy.

Contact Us

Please send your feedback, comments, requests for technical support to support@budgetmaker.app
